name: Goals Chart for NOTION
description: Do you have a Goal Chart in Notion?A way to set & track your goals? I find this is a perfect beginner's case to start using Notion and specifically databases in Notion. Doesn't have to be fancy. Just start in table view and add your goals.Here, use mine to get started!FAQHow to get this for free?Simply add "0" to the "Name a fair price" input box.Is Notion free?Yes. You can use it for free. Notion offers paid plans, but those are optional for Write OS.How do I add this template to my Notion
